NonPII.nonPIIAccessMechanism: This project deals with public information (about services) and our main product is a non-proprietary data exchange format. Our main product is the format, and associated tools that help people standardize their directory data and  share it in new ways. We don't have a single software system, we help establish standards, interoperability, and cooperative partnerships among existing systems using these nonproprietary tools.

privacyComplianceList: Open Referral doesn't traffic in any personal information to which laws might apply. We produce nonproprietary specifications for exchanging public information.
adherenceSteps: Open Referral doesn't traffic in any personal information to which laws might apply. We produce nonproprietary specifications for exchanging public information.

preventHarm.additionalInfoMechanismProcessesPolicies: Our work is guided through active engagement with stakeholders â€“ ultimately people in need (help-seekers), though primarily service providers  who are in a position to help help-seekers. We engage with such stakeholders through each phase of our participatory design and development processes.

dataPrivacySecurity.privacySecurityDescription: Our project only works with  public information about the health, human, and social services available to people in need. Personal, private information is not within our scope.

stepsAddressRiskPreventSafetyUnderageUse: We facilitate stakeholder-centric design processes in our pilot projects.
